data.system_settings: iPhone 6S with iOS 11.0.2 & iPad Air 2 with iOS 11.1 PB 1
data.actual_result: The interaction menu only opens when clicking on the image.
data.expected_result: The interaction menu (close image, share image etc.) should always open regardless of where you click in the preview
data.short_description: Clicking outside of an image in image preview won't open interaction menu
data.steps_to_repro: - Click on any image uploaded or embed to Discord to open the image preview - Click on a spot outside of the actual image - Observe it
